abstract: Next year, Cisco will begin selling the Cius tablet, which runs Google’s Android software and is aimed at corporate users.
snippet: Next year, Cisco will begin selling the Cius tablet, which runs Google’s Android software and is aimed at corporate users.
lead_paragraph: Forget the frenzy of the consumer market, the jazzy advertising and the retail-shelf-space wars. Cisco Systems intends to hawk tablet computers in the more sedate world of the office.
